hero_title: Finding the {highlight1} in the {highlight2} Just Got Easier
hero_description: We connect you with curated & professional verified nannies.

steps.title: Tell Us About Your Family
steps.description: Parents fill out basic info: child’s age, location, special preferences (language, cultural requirements).

steps.title: Explore Recommended Nannies
steps.description: Your platform suggests suitable matches based on the family’s input.

steps.title: Interview & Book
steps.description: Get in touch with the Nanny and interview her.

steps.title: Rate & Review
steps.description: Provide feedback to help others and maintain community quality.

reasons.title: Verified and Trusted Nannies
reasons.description: Background checks, identity verification, and certifications.

reasons.title: AI-Powered Matching
reasons.description: Intelligent recommendations based on detailed family preferences and nanny skill sets.

faqs.question: 1. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing eli?
faqs.answer: We conduct thorough background checks, verify references, check employment history, and conduct in-person interviews. All nannies must also provide proof of relevant certifications.

faqs.question: 2. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing eli?
faqs.answer: We offer a replacement guarantee within the first 30 days. If you're not satisfied with your nanny, we'll help you find a replacement at no additional cost.

faqs.question: 3. Lorem ip sit amet, consectetu olp popor adipiscing eli?
faqs.answer: Nanny rates vary based on experience, qualifications, and responsibilities. We can help you understand market rates and develop a fair compensation package.

faqs.question: 4. Lorem ip sit amet, consectetur adipiscing eli?
faqs.answer: Yes, we can help you find temporary or backup care solutions. Many of our nannies are available for short-term assignments or last-minute care.

faqs.question: 5. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetupiscing eli?
faqs.answer: While individual nannies are typically covered under your homeowners insurance, we recommend additional liability insurance. We can provide guidance on insurance options.

preferencesTitle: Share Your Preferences, We’ll Do the Rest
preferencesDescription: Tell us about your family’s needs, and we’ll suggest the perfect nanny matches for you!

basic plan.name: Basic Plan
features: Access to the nanny directory for a limited time

premium plan.name: Premium Plan
features: Priority booking, unlimited interviews, advanced filters (language, special needs)

ultimate plan.name: Ultimate Plan
features: Priority booking, unlimited interviews, advanced filters (language, special needs)
Ongoing dedicated support, premium nanny profiles, extra screening options
